# **CRIM 250**

This is Tori Borlase's website for CRIM 250. Tori is a senior at the University of Pennsylvania studying Philosophy, Politics, and Economics and Criminology.  Here you will find all of her assignments and exams, which include statistical analyses of relevant criminology-related data.
